description:
The Akazaya members who were on board Law’s Polar Tang finally reach Onigashima and see someone who they didn’t expect. Kaido’s son Yamato starts telling his story to Luffy, shares his passion, and reveals what’s behind his mask!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Desire to Be Oden! Yamato`s Dream!
Devenir Oden ! Le souhait de Yamato
Ich möchte Oden sein – Yamatos Wunsch
Oden ni Naritai: Yamato no Omoi
¡El despertar de los samuráis! ¡La furia de los Akazaya!
الرّغبة في أن يكون أودن! حلم ياماتو!
おでんになりたい ヤマトの思い
